$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_07,0|$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Play, play play! C'mon—let's play!$k$pLet's play...hide-and-seek!$k$pWe can play here, and no one will
even know. It's like a secret!$k$pNo telling any grown-ups!$k$pPlay, play play! C'mon—let's play!$k$pLet's play...forever!$k$pLet's play! Let's play...$k$p$Sbs2000|$Fo2000,255,255,255,255|
